title: !!!BUGSPLAT FIX!!!
body:
!!!HAB NE LÃ–SUNG GEFUNDEN DIE BEI MIR WORKED!!!

Just reset your Internet after opening the launcher:

Start LoL launcher.
Open CMD (press win+r -> type "cmd" -> hit enter).
In the CMD window that pops up, type "ipconfig /release" and hit enter. Wait for a few lines of code to appear (might take up to 5 seconds).
In the same window, type "ipconfig /renew" and hit enter. Wait again.
Switch back to the LoL launcher and sign in.

replies.body: Bei mir funktioniert das leider nicht
